players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie, watch out! I'm the mafioso. Stay cautious."
You: "Charlie, be careful! Villager Bob was killed last night. Watch out for the mafioso."
Charlie: "I'm the detective. Diana is mafioso. Be cautious, Charlie."
Diana: "Charlie, keep investigating. I eliminated Bob last night."
Charlie: "I'm the detective. Diana confessed she's mafia. Alice, Charlie, stay vigilant."
You: "Charlie, stay alert. Diana confessed to mafia role. Be cautious."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested
